scenes.description: Performance of the song 'MAKE IT, BREAK IT'.
Performance of the song 'stay by my side', including an intro MC.

subtitles.original: 演者は嬉しいでしょ 噛み入る 噛み入る Na
subtitles.english: The performers are happy, right? Getting into it, getting into it, na...

subtitles.original: 置いてかないぜ tie 付いてきて five MCs
subtitles.english: We won't leave you behind, tie; keep up with the five MCs.

subtitles.original: 本気の Friday Night, MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: A serious Friday Night, MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: MAKE A REVOLUTION 私を貫け
subtitles.english: MAKE A REVOLUTION, pierce through me.

subtitles.original: 傾け 夢に koi koi koi
subtitles.english: Strike a pose, fall in love with the dream, koi koi koi.

subtitles.original: NO PLACE FOR NEVER STOP 真ん中ブチ抜け
subtitles.english: NO PLACE FOR NEVER STOP, break through the middle.

subtitles.original: 行け 今日よりな
subtitles.english: Go, more than today.

subtitles.original: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: MAKE IT, BREAK IT, BANG BANG BANG
subtitles.english: MAKE IT, BREAK IT, BANG BANG BANG!

subtitles.original: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: ほら どっちにするの？
subtitles.english: Look, which one will it be?

subtitles.original: ゾクゾク湧く FLOW GO 前より高揚
subtitles.english: The flow wells up with excitement, go! More uplifted than before.

subtitles.original: If you wanna be my men よそ見とかはなしで
subtitles.english: If you wanna be my men, no looking away.

subtitles.original: BURNY もっと HOLLAR もっと HOLLAR 熱くなっちゃって
subtitles.english: BURNY, more HOLLAR, more HOLLAR, getting heated up.

subtitles.original: BURNY HOLLAR HOLLAR もっと HOLLAR 本気になっちゃって
subtitles.english: BURNY HOLLAR HOLLAR, more HOLLAR, getting serious.

subtitles.original: 置いてかないぜ tie 付いてきて five MCs
subtitles.english: We won't leave you behind, tie; keep up with the five MCs.

subtitles.original: 本気の Friday Night, MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: A serious Friday Night, MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: BRAND NEW GENERATION 感じるまま上がれ
subtitles.english: BRAND NEW GENERATION, rise up as you feel.

subtitles.original: 上がれ 狩れに恋降り降り降り
subtitles.english: Rise up, let love fall, fall, fall upon the hunt.

subtitles.original: ONE SIZE FOR NEVER LIE さあこれ抜け出して
subtitles.english: ONE SIZE FOR NEVER LIE, now break out of this.

subtitles.original: 焦せ 練りはない
subtitles.english: Hurry, there's no time to refine.

subtitles.original: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: MAKE IT, BREAK IT, BANG BANG BANG
subtitles.english: MAKE IT, BREAK IT, BANG BANG BANG!

subtitles.original: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: 頭まで MAKE A NOISE!
subtitles.english: From head to toe, MAKE A NOISE!

subtitles.original: FG 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: FG, let's go!

subtitles.original: MAKE A REVOLUTION 私を貫け
subtitles.english: MAKE A REVOLUTION, pierce through me.

subtitles.original: 傾け 夢に koi koi koi
subtitles.english: Strike a pose, fall in love with the dream, koi koi koi.

subtitles.original: NO PLACE FOR NEVER STOP 真ん中ブチ抜け
subtitles.english: NO PLACE FOR NEVER STOP, break through the middle.

subtitles.original: 行け 今日よりな
subtitles.english: Go, more than today.

subtitles.original: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: MAKE IT, BREAK IT, BANG BANG BANG
subtitles.english: MAKE IT, BREAK IT, BANG BANG BANG!

subtitles.original: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: YOU SEE MAKE IT, BREAK IT, MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: MAKE IT, BREAK IT
subtitles.english: MAKE IT, BREAK IT.

subtitles.original: ほら どっちにするの？
subtitles.english: Look, which one will it be?

subtitles.original: いよいよ次が最後の曲です。
subtitles.english: Finally, the next song is our last one.

subtitles.original: 聴いてください。 stay by my side.
subtitles.english: Please listen: 'stay by my side'.

subtitles.original: ずっと忘れない みんなとの first day
subtitles.english: I'll never forget the first day with everyone.

subtitles.original: 積もり込めく あれは fake face
subtitles.english: Piling up, that was a fake face.

subtitles.original: 見せ尽くでハリボテ
subtitles.english: A façade shown to the fullest.

subtitles.original: 期待と不安詰め込んで 歩き出したんだ せーので
subtitles.english: Packed with expectation and anxiety, we started walking together.

subtitles.original: 強がってた青臭な花びら
subtitles.english: The green petals that were trying to be tough.

subtitles.original: でもみんなに気付かされた そのままでええやん
subtitles.english: But everyone made me realize, it's fine just as you are.

subtitles.original: 語ら当たり前じゃない この日々
subtitles.english: These days we share aren't just ordinary.

subtitles.original: バカになっても一緒にいたい bye bibi
subtitles.english: Even if we act like fools, I want to be together, bye bibi.

subtitles.original: 気付いたら騒がし毎日
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, every day was noisy.

subtitles.original: 違う歩幅 どこに行く私たち
subtitles.english: With different strides, where are we heading?

subtitles.original: 迷う自分 みんなくれる刺激
subtitles.english: A lost self, but everyone gives me inspiration.

subtitles.original: 慣れ合いじゃない これって素敵
subtitles.english: It's not just getting cozy, this is wonderful.

subtitles.original: まだリーダーって胸張れなくても
subtitles.english: Even if I can't proudly call myself a leader yet...

subtitles.original: 持ってる何かある 盾なる覚悟
subtitles.english: There's something I have—the resolve to be a shield.

subtitles.original: 自分のため 私 歌って踊る
subtitles.english: For myself, I sing and dance.

subtitles.original: ステージ プロローグ 刻む日々目
subtitles.english: The stage prologue, carving out each day.

subtitles.original: stay by my side
subtitles.english: Stay by my side.

subtitles.original: 夜中になってもまだ寝れない yeah
subtitles.english: Even when it's late at night, I still can't sleep, yeah.

subtitles.original: あとどのくらい
subtitles.english: Just how much longer...

subtitles.original: 出辿り着く あの夢の世界
subtitles.english: ...until I reach that world of dreams?

subtitles.original: 初めて会ったあの日
subtitles.english: That day we first met.

subtitles.original: また輪になって遊んだり
subtitles.english: Gathering in a circle and playing again.

subtitles.original: ここまで歩いてきた見ゆ
subtitles.english: The view from how far we've walked.

subtitles.original: 今でも覚えてる
subtitles.english: I still remember it now.

subtitles.original: stay by my side
subtitles.english: Stay by my side.

subtitles.original: 街角で二人
subtitles.english: The two of us on a street corner.

subtitles.original: by my side
subtitles.english: By my side.

subtitles.original: 考えたら一人
subtitles.english: When I think about it, I'm alone.

subtitles.original: 無駄にはならないから
subtitles.english: Because it won't go to waste...

subtitles.original: あの涙も
subtitles.english: ...even those tears.

subtitles.original: 今ここ by my side
subtitles.english: Now, right here, by my side.

subtitles.original: 寄り添ってる隣
subtitles.english: Cuddled up right next to me.

subtitles.original: ずっと昔 はぐれた炎
subtitles.english: The flame that strayed long ago.

subtitles.original: 夜を必死に照らしたこと
subtitles.english: Lighting up the night with all its might.

subtitles.original: 集まる星は追ったこと
subtitles.english: Chasing the gathering stars.

subtitles.original: それは波長 これからも送る音
subtitles.english: That's the wavelength; the sound I'll keep sending.

subtitles.original: 暗闇の中見えない a way
subtitles.english: A way invisible in the darkness.

subtitles.original: 道標はあなたの再
subtitles.english: The signpost is your presence again.

subtitles.original: 光をこの手を離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let go of the light, of this hand.

subtitles.original: 空の始まりより煌めいて
subtitles.english: Sparkling more than the dawn of the sky.

subtitles.original: 幸先いい一人 同じ夢
subtitles.english: A lucky one, the same dream.

subtitles.original: 追い合いじゃない weも一人じゃない
subtitles.english: It's not a chase; we're not alone either.

subtitles.original: 隅々やばい プロローグの宇宙
subtitles.english: Insane in every corner, the universe of the prologue.

subtitles.original: 可能性は未知数 ストリーム配信に夢中
subtitles.english: Possibilities are endless, obsessed with streaming.

subtitles.original: いつかみんなで行こうわい
subtitles.english: Let's all go together someday.

subtitles.original: きけラララ セラピービーハッピー 楽しみたい日々
subtitles.english: Listen, la-la-la, therapy, be happy, days I want to enjoy.

subtitles.original: どこか名詞に込めた四人を
subtitles.english: The four of us embedded in nouns somewhere...

subtitles.original: 私たちはやれるきっと from Lindo
subtitles.english: ...we can surely do it, from Lindoh.

subtitles.original: シナジーで足りてる？
subtitles.english: Is the synergy enough?

subtitles.original: うー！ BB！
subtitles.english: Woo! BB!

subtitles.original: エンちゃん カレ let's go!
subtitles.english: En-chan, Kare, let's go!

subtitles.original: リアナ in da house! オリビア行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Riana in da house! Olivia, let's go!

subtitles.original: stay by my side
subtitles.english: Stay by my side.

subtitles.original: 夜中になってもまだ寝れない
subtitles.english: Even when it's late at night, I still can't sleep.

subtitles.original: Yeah あとどのくらい
subtitles.english: Yeah, just how much longer...

subtitles.original: 出辿り着く あの夢の世界
subtitles.english: ...until I reach that world of dreams?

subtitles.original: 初めて会ったあの日
subtitles.english: That day we first met.

subtitles.original: また輪になって遊んだり
subtitles.english: Gathering in a circle and playing again.

subtitles.original: ここまで歩いてきた見ゆ
subtitles.english: The view from how far we've walked.

subtitles.original: 今でも覚えてる
subtitles.english: I still remember it now.

subtitles.original: 上がれビート 夜も寝れぬ
subtitles.english: Rise up, beat! I can't even sleep at night.

subtitles.original: 置き去りにした生活リズム 十二ヶ月
subtitles.english: A lifestyle rhythm left behind for twelve months.

subtitles.original: 共にいった振り返る
subtitles.english: Looking back on where we went together.

subtitles.original: 愚痴に持ったりしたっていいんじゃない
subtitles.english: Isn't it fine to even have some complaints?

subtitles.original: 威嚇自己拒否ともない
subtitles.english: Without intimidation or self-rejection.

subtitles.original: 一人で抱え込むんなよ ほら水臭い
subtitles.english: Don't bottle it all up alone; look, don't be a stranger.

subtitles.original: 最後に自分らしくいれ 心配ない
subtitles.english: Be yourself in the end, don't worry.

subtitles.original: 美味いもん食べいこうぜ 次一回
subtitles.english: Let's go eat something good next time.

subtitles.original: stay by my side
subtitles.english: Stay by my side.

subtitles.original: 夜中になってもまだ寝れない
subtitles.english: Even when it's late at night, I still can't sleep.

subtitles.original: で あとどのくらい
subtitles.english: And just how much longer...

subtitles.original: 出辿り着く あの夢の世界
subtitles.english: ...until I reach that world of dreams?

subtitles.original: 初めて会ったあの日
subtitles.english: That day we first met.

subtitles.original: また輪になって遊んだり
subtitles.english: Gathering in a circle and playing again.

subtitles.original: ここまで歩いてきた見ゆ 今でも覚えてる
subtitles.english: The view from how far we've walked, I still remember it now.
